abiDocs.name: getBalanceInEth
abiDocs.notice: Returns equivalent Ether balance for a given address

abiDocs.name: sendCoin
abiDocs.details: This is just a simple example of a coin-like contract. It is not standards compatible and cannot be expected to talk to other coin/token contracts. If you want to create a standards-compliant token, see: [ConsenSys/Tokens](https://github.com/ConsenSys/Tokens). Cheers!
abiDocs.notice: Transfer coins from sender to receiver

abiDocs.name: getBalance
abiDocs.notice: Returns MetaCoin balance for a given address
